column4: Right.  Question that I hope is humiliatingly easy.  The new Ubuntu installer is complaining I don't have 2.4 GB free.  Checking back in Windows 7, I have the entirety of my second Hard Drive as "Unallocated."  There is no option to format, merely to add a volume.  This is correct, right?  But it still doesn't like it.
